player.name: Lars
player.background:
The Eternal Flame at the center of the Ashen Camp dances hypnotically, casting long shadows from the temporary structures that surround it. You've arrived just days ago, but already the Covenant has accepted you as one of their own – an unusually quick integration into their normally closed society. Perhaps they saw something in you that suggested an affinity for their ways, or perhaps the ancestors spoke your name during a ritual.

Your tent, like all others in the camp, is designed for quick assembly and disassembly. The nomadic Ashen Covenant never stays in one place long, following ancient migration patterns known only to their elders. All possessions are considered temporary – including the ritual dagger you were gifted this morning, which you're expected to surrender during the next Possession Exchange ceremony.

An elder approaches you now, their skin bearing the distinctive gray markings that indicate frequent Ash Walking – the mysterious practice of projecting consciousness through the ashes of the dead to commune with ancestors or travel spiritually to the Ashen plane. They've promised to begin your initial training today, starting with the fundamental philosophy that nothing – not possessions, not places, not even lives – is permanent. All returns to ash eventually, and in understanding this, the Covenant finds freedom.

conversation_history.content:
==== WELCOME TO YOUR ADVENTURE ====

Greetings, Lars the Cinderspawn Cleric from The Eternal Flame at the center of the Ashen Camp dances hypnotically, casting long shadows from the temporary structures that surround it. You've arrived just days ago, but already the Covenant has accepted you as one of their own – an unusually quick integration into their normally closed society. Perhaps they saw something in you that suggested an affinity for their ways, or perhaps the ancestors spoke your name during a ritual.

Your tent, like all others in the camp, is designed for quick assembly and disassembly. The nomadic Ashen Covenant never stays in one place long, following ancient migration patterns known only to their elders. All possessions are considered temporary – including the ritual dagger you were gifted this morning, which you're expected to surrender during the next Possession Exchange ceremony.

An elder approaches you now, their skin bearing the distinctive gray markings that indicate frequent Ash Walking – the mysterious practice of projecting consciousness through the ashes of the dead to commune with ancestors or travel spiritually to the Ashen plane. They've promised to begin your initial training today, starting with the fundamental philosophy that nothing – not possessions, not places, not even lives – is permanent. All returns to ash eventually, and in understanding this, the Covenant finds freedom.!

Your journey begins now...

551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.title: Whispers of the Ash Plane (Ashen Covenant Recruit)
551cdb35-a4bb-4b23-b6c1-4d2772947efb.description: The Ashen Elder has tasked you with your first practical Ash Walking ritual. The Covenant needs to find a new, safe migration path, and the Elder believes a long-dead ancestor holds the key within the Ash Plane. You must project your consciousness, seek the ancestral spirit, and glean crucial information to guide your people.

objectives.description: Gather specific ritual ashes from the designated area near the Ashen Camp.
Perform the guided Ash Walking ritual at the sacred altar within the Ashen Camp.
Within the Ash Plane, seek out the ancestral spirit and glean information about a safe migration path.
Return to your body and consult with the Ashen Elder to interpret the ancestral message.
Based on the interpreted ancestral guidance, scout the new migration path in Echo Woods.

TEST_Q04.title: Q04 – Speak to the Test Elder

TEST_Q13.title: Q13 – Semantic Mandatory + Optional DSL
TEST_Q13.description: Mandatory semantic objective and optional visit objective.

TEST_Q14.title: Q14 – Flag Chain
TEST_Q14.description: Require both flags set (speak to guard and acquire pass).

objectives.description: Speak to guard and acquire pass.

TEST_Q16.title: Q16 – Any of Three Enemies
TEST_Q16.description: Defeat any one of three test bandits.

TEST_Q19.title: Q19 – Mixed All/Any
TEST_Q19.description: Travel to dock or harbor and have a test_ticket.

objectives.description: Visit test_dock or test_harbor and show test_ticket.

TEST_Q20.title: Q20 – Optional Does Not Block
TEST_Q20.description: Optional objective should not block completion.

TEST_Q21.title: Q21 – Narrative-Heavy Objective
TEST_Q21.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the council.

objectives.description: Deliver an inspiring speech to the test_council about unity and cooperation.

TEST_Q23.title: Q23 – Semantic Failure Gating
TEST_Q23.description: Objective completion depends on semantic inference only.

TEST_Q24.title: Q24 – Abandon/Fallback Scenario
TEST_Q24.description: Regular quest for abandon/failure flow testing.

TEST_Q25.title: Q25 – Complex Mixed Conditions
TEST_Q25.description: Any of two routes, but no alarm and with resource gate.

objectives.description: Route A (visit test_tower AND have test_rope) OR Route B (defeat test_spider_queen) with no alarm.

STR.name: STRENGTH
STR.description: Physical power, affects melee damage and carrying capacity.

DEX.name: DEXTERITY
DEX.description: Agility and reflexes, affects ranged attacks, initiative, and dodge.

CON.name: CONSTITUTION
CON.description: Physical resilience, affects health, stamina, and resistance to poison/disease.

INT.name: INTELLIGENCE
INT.description: Mental acuity, affects spell power and learning ability.

WIS.name: WISDOM
WIS.description: Intuition and perception, affects magical resistance and willpower.

CHA.name: CHARISMA
CHA.description: Social influence, affects dialogue, prices, and persuasion.

WIL.name: WILLPOWER
WIL.description: Mental fortitude, resistance to influence and fear.

INS.name: INSIGHT
INS.description: Understanding situations, detecting lies, and sensing motives.

Melee Attack.name: MELEE_ATTACK
Melee Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents in melee combat.

Ranged Attack.name: RANGED_ATTACK
Ranged Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with ranged weapons.

Magic Attack.name: MAGIC_ATTACK
Magic Attack.description: Your ability to hit opponents with magical attacks.

Defense.name: DEFENSE
Defense.description: Your ability to avoid physical damage.

Magic Defense.name: MAGIC_DEFENSE
Magic Defense.description: Your ability to resist magical effects.

Damage Reduction.name: DAMAGE_REDUCTION
Damage Reduction.description: Reduces incoming physical damage by a flat amount.

Initiative.name: INITIATIVE
Initiative.description: Determines your turn order in combat.

Carry Capacity.name: CARRY_CAPACITY
Carry Capacity.description: The maximum weight you can carry.

Movement.name: MOVEMENT
Movement.description: How far you can move in combat.

Health Points.name: HEALTH
Health Points.description: Your current hit points. When this reaches zero, you are incapacitated.

Resolve.name: RESOLVE
Resolve.description: Your current social/mental composure. Reduced by stress or social defeats.

Mana Points.name: MANA
Mana Points.description: Your current magical energy. Required for casting spells.

Stamina.name: STAMINA
Stamina.description: Your current physical energy. Required for special physical actions.

7f88f9c1-7c60-47b1-9c75-09c5a0516bfb.name: Ash-Treated Clothing
7f88f9c1-7c60-47b1-9c75-09c5a0516bfb.description: Simple, durable clothing treated with sacred ashes for resilience and a faint connection to ancestral spirits. Common among the Ashen Covenant.

3a9078e1-5ee2-4069-82f9-c195ba6be661.name: Covenant Pendant
3a9078e1-5ee2-4069-82f9-c195ba6be661.description: A small, carved bone pendant bearing the symbol of the Ashen Covenant. It's said to ward off minor malevolent spirits.

2226893f-20eb-4679-ae8f-8ec4a8fc75a8.name: Fire Striker
2226893f-20eb-4679-ae8f-8ec4a8fc75a8.description: A reliable flint and steel for starting fires. Essential for survival and Covenant rituals.

eca0de1c-da03-4e5e-aba0-1b3f251ef821.name: Ritual Dagger
eca0de1c-da03-4e5e-aba0-1b3f251ef821.description: A ceremonial dagger, sharp and well-balanced, used by the Ashen Covenant in their rites. It feels strangely warm to the touch.

6b74a94c-9fd1-4384-a778-a83cc01b2eee.name: Small Pouch of Ancestral Ash
6b74a94c-9fd1-4384-a778-a83cc01b2eee.description: A leather pouch containing a mixture of sacred ashes from revered ancestors of the Ashen Covenant. Used in rituals and for guidance.
